__e: I was inside the Laundromat across the street.
Woman across the road in the launderette said she saw a man come in here about two hours ago.
Uh, so it looks like a laundromat from the outside, but inside it's a speakeasy.
I think the reason you keep spinning this dry-cleaning thing is because you're jealous.
Carl, I got a lot of stuff to do today, and now I got your laundry to do on top of that.
I think the only reason we go to the dry cleaner is so I can say to the dry cleaner:
She offered to do my laundry for life, so...
If you kill me now, you get nothing but a dry-cleaning bill to get my blood out of your nice white suit.
I'm going to the laundry to clean the money otherwise, it doesn't do anybody any good.
I was just going to say what she would have said but then he asked me if I worked in the laundry as well and I just started talking.
Alright before we hit exposition city here, what's with the laundry on the outside - and this crazy green place on the inside ?
So, I get the dry cleaning and you get what?
I had to stop next-door for my dry cleaning anyway.
Madame, i understand there is something in the way of laundry that i should take.
